data.title: South Sudan Population (2024)
data.meta_description: Discover the latest population statistics for South Sudan and explore demographic trends with our interactive data visualizations.
data.text:
Population of South Sudan as of today

The current population of South Sudan is 11,301,368 with an annual growth rate of 1.708%. South Sudan has a population of 0.138% of the world's population.
